panels.description: Top SQLs ordered by Elapsed Time

targets.expr:
topk(100,(
   sum(last_over_time(mssql_top_elapsed_sql{alias="$alias", sql_handle="$sql_id"}[$__range]) / 1000000 -
       min_over_time(mssql_top_elapsed_sql{alias="$alias", sql_handle="$sql_id"}[$__range]) / 1000000)
    by (job, alias, db, instance, sql_handle, plan_handle, statement_start_offset, partial_query) 
))

topk(100,(
   sum(last_over_time(mssql_top_cpu_sql{alias="$alias", sql_handle="$sql_id"}[$__range]) / 1000000 -
       min_over_time(mssql_top_cpu_sql{alias="$alias", sql_handle="$sql_id"}[$__range]) / 1000000)
    by (job, alias, db, instance, sql_handle, plan_handle, statement_start_offset) 
))

topk(100,(
   sum(last_over_time(mssql_top_exec_sql{alias="$alias", sql_handle="$sql_id"}[$__range]) -
       min_over_time(mssql_top_exec_sql{alias="$alias", sql_handle="$sql_id"}[$__range]))
    by (job, alias, db, instance, sql_handle, plan_handle, statement_start_offset) 
))

topk(100,(
   sum(last_over_time(mssql_top_logical_read_sql{alias="$alias", sql_handle="$sql_id"}[$__range]) -
       min_over_time(mssql_top_logical_read_sql{alias="$alias", sql_handle="$sql_id"}[$__range]))
    by (job, alias, db, instance, sql_handle, plan_handle, statement_start_offset) 
))

topk(100,(
   sum(last_over_time(mssql_top_physical_read_sql{alias="$alias", sql_handle="$sql_id"}[$__range]) -
       min_over_time(mssql_top_physical_read_sql{alias="$alias", sql_handle="$sql_id"}[$__range]))
    by (job, alias, db, instance, sql_handle, plan_handle, statement_start_offset) 
))

panels.description: Top SQLs ordered by Elapsed Time

targets.expr:
topk(100,(
   sum(last_over_time(mssql_top_elapsed_sql{alias="$alias", sql_handle="$sql_id"}[$__range] offset $diff_intv) / 1000000 -
       min_over_time(mssql_top_elapsed_sql{alias="$alias", sql_handle="$sql_id"}[$__range] offset $diff_intv) / 1000000)
    by (job, alias, db, instance, sql_handle, plan_handle, statement_start_offset, partial_query) 
)) >= ((1-$use_diff)*100000000000000000000000000000000000000000)

topk(100,(
   sum(last_over_time(mssql_top_cpu_sql{alias="$alias", sql_handle="$sql_id"}[$__range] offset $diff_intv) / 1000000 -
       min_over_time(mssql_top_cpu_sql{alias="$alias", sql_handle="$sql_id"}[$__range] offset $diff_intv) / 1000000)
    by (job, alias, db, instance, sql_handle, plan_handle, statement_start_offset) 
)) >= ((1-$use_diff)*100000000000000000000000000000000000000000)

topk(100,(
   sum(last_over_time(mssql_top_exec_sql{alias="$alias", sql_handle="$sql_id"}[$__range] offset $diff_intv) -
       min_over_time(mssql_top_exec_sql{alias="$alias", sql_handle="$sql_id"}[$__range] offset $diff_intv))
    by (job, alias, db, instance, sql_handle, plan_handle, statement_start_offset) 
)) >= ((1-$use_diff)*100000000000000000000000000000000000000000)

topk(100,(
   sum(last_over_time(mssql_top_logical_read_sql{alias="$alias", sql_handle="$sql_id"}[$__range] offset $diff_intv) -
       min_over_time(mssql_top_logical_read_sql{alias="$alias", sql_handle="$sql_id"}[$__range] offset $diff_intv))
    by (job, alias, db, instance, sql_handle, plan_handle, statement_start_offset) 
)) >= ((1-$use_diff)*100000000000000000000000000000000000000000)

topk(100,(
   sum(last_over_time(mssql_top_physical_read_sql{alias="$alias", sql_handle="$sql_id"}[$__range] offset $diff_intv) -
       min_over_time(mssql_top_physical_read_sql{alias="$alias", sql_handle="$sql_id"}[$__range] offset $diff_intv))
    by (job, alias, db, instance, sql_handle, plan_handle, statement_start_offset) 
)) >= ((1-$use_diff)*100000000000000000000000000000000000000000)

list.description: Interval for refreshing the visualization of Graphs
list.label: interval
list.name: intv

list.description:
previous days, You can input directly.
ex) 4d, 6w
list.label: Comp. Period
list.name: diff_intv

list.description: Input the sql_id minimum first 5 characters.
list.label: sql_id
list.name: sql_id

list.description: Input the sql_id minimum first 5 characters.
list.label: sql_text
list.name: sql_text
